requiredEquipmentExplanation: The metadata, including the title, description, and tags, explicitly states that the workout is a '15 min Calisthenics Workout | No Equipment | All Levels.' Additionally, the description mentions that the workout requires 'no bars, no parallettes needed,' and only requires 'yourself and motivation.' The tags reinforce the focus on a 'calisthenics workout no equipment,' indicating it is designed to be performed without any additional equipment. The user comments and detailed exercises described, such as pike pushups and planche leans, further support that this workout is purely based on bodyweight exercises and does not require any equipment. Therefore, it is classified as a bodyweight-only workout without any necessary equipment.
